text: " "Jesus of Suburbia was the fifth and final single to be released from Green Day's seventh studio album, American Idiot. ==Track listings== Australian single: #"Jesus of Suburbia" - 9:09 #"Are We the Waiting" (Live from VH1 Storytellers) - 2:57 #"St. Jimmy" (Live from VH1 Storytellers) - 3:07 10" vinyl: Side A #"Jesus of Suburbia" - 9:09 Side B #"St. Jimmy" (Live from VH1 Storytellers) - 3:07 Category:Green Day songs Category:2005 songs
title: Jesus of Suburbia
